short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly bulk delete and archive all your LinkedIn messages in just a few clicks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your LinkedIn Messaging with Ease!

Is your LinkedIn inbox overflowing? Our efficient 'Delete All Messages and Archive on LinkedIn 2025' extension is designed to help you declutter and maintain a neat and organized messaging environment with just a few simple clicks!

Key Features:
*One-Click Deletion and Archiving: Effortlessly erase or archive all your messages on LinkedIn 
   with our powerful one-click extension.
* Control Deletion Process: Start and stop the message removal process as needed, giving you 
   complete control.
* Track Deletion in Real-Time: View the deletion progress live through the extension popup, 
   displaying each message as itâ€™s removed.
*  Free Version Cap: You can delete up to 5 messages with the free version.

Why Our Extension?
Our tool is crafted with an intuitive interface to ensure a seamless experience. Whether you need to clean up your inbox or start anew, "Delete All Messages on LinkedIn 2025" is the ideal solution for keeping your messages organized.

How It Works:
1. Add the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. The extension operates in English.
3. Click on the extension icon.
4. Press the "Go to LinkedIn page" button, if LinkedIn is not open.
5. Click on either Delete All Messages or Archive Messages as needed; you can also choose to Stop at any time.


Say farewell to message overload and embrace a tidier LinkedIn experience. Download "Delete All Messages on LinkedIn 2025" now and take charge of your inbox!

Note: This extension is not officially authorized by LinkedIn
